resources.string: Cheesecake Swirl

• 200g berries
• 1 cup of almond flour
• 50g butter
• 2 eggs
• 200g mascarpone
• 250g creme cheese
• 4 spoons of sweetener
• lemon juice
• Vanilla extract
Carbs:\nFats:\nProtein:

1. Blend fruits – heat on sauce pan and add sugar – similar to jam. Sift the jam to get rid of seeds and leave it to cool down.
	2. Corpus – cup of almond flour mix with melted butter add teaspoon of sweetener and pinch of salt – bake for 10min on 175*C
	3. Cream – Mix cream cheese and mascarpone with sweetener, add egg one by one and lemon juice with vanilla extract. To make it swirl separate half of the cream and add the jam in to it and mix. When corpus is cooler add white cream after the jam cream to make the swirl. Bake for 35–45min on 160*C. Leave it in the fridge at least 4h.
Burger Buns

• 1 egg
• 40g creme cheese
• 1 spoon of almond flour
• 1 spoon of psyllium
• 1 spoon of linseed flour
• Pinch of baking powder
• salt/pepper

Carbs:
Fats:
Protein:
Mix all ingredients together, leave for 5min and bake for 25min on 190*C.
Garlic Bread

• 1 cup of shredded mozzarella
• ¼ cup of parmesan
• 1 egg
• Garlic powder/ salt

Carbs: 
Fats: 
Protein:
Mix all together and bake in air fryer 10min on 180–200*C.
Pizza Snails

• 250g of quark
• 5 eggs
• 60g of almond flour
• 1 spoon of psyllium
• 200g of shredded cheese
• Baking powder
• salt/garlic powder
• Ham, cheese, tomato pure

Carbs: 
Fats: 
Protein:

\t1. Separate the eggs and beat them to snow. Other ingredients mix all together. Spread in on baking paper and bake for 12min on 180*C.\n\t2. Spread tomato pure on a dough sprinkle oregano. Add some ham and cheese and roll it to roll shape and cut them on 2cm fat slices, spread an egg on top and put back in oven on 10–12min on 180*C.
Pizza

• 1 mozzarella or 120g of grated mozzarella
• 3 eggs
• 1 spoon of chia seeds
• 4 spoons of almond flour
• Baking powder
• salt /pepper

Carbs: 
Fats: 
Protein:
\t1. Mix all ingredients together and spread it in to pizza shape. Bake for 10min on 180*C.\n\t2. Add any toppings and bake for another 10min.
Lava Cake

• 2 eggs
• 30g dark chocolate
• 30g of butter
• Spoon of peanut butter (optional)
• 10g coconut flour
• Pinch of baking powder
• Sweetener (optional)

Carbs: 
Fats: 
Protein:

\t1. Melt chocolate, butter and peanut butter together add coconut flour and baking powder\n\t2. Break eggs in to separate bowl and beat them in to foam\n\t3. Add chocolate into egg and mix all together. Pour into a form and bake for 10min on 190*C. You can add an extra square of chocolate in the middle.
Babovka

• 260g of almond flour
• 60g of sweetener
• 4 eggs
• 250ml of double cream
• Baking powder
• Cocoa

Carbs: 
Fats: 
Protein:

\t1. Mix all dry ingredients together and in separate bowl we mix eggs and cream then we mix all together.\n\t2. Dough separate for two part and in one we add cocoa and mix again....\n\t3. We bake 50min for 150*C.
Seeds Bread

• 4 eggs
• 3 spoons of psyllium
• 150g of greek yogurt
• 80g of linseed flour
• 60g of any seeds
• Baking powder
• Salt/pepper

Carbs: 
Fats: 
Protein:
Mix all ingredients, leave 5min to combine all together and bake for 50min on 160*C.
